mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_goods_shop_base (SHOP_ID, CAT_ID, CAT_PATH, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TITLE, SHOP_LOGO, SHOP_NOTICE, SHOP_DESC, GOODS_SCORE, SERVICE_SCORE, SHIPPER_SCORE, AUDIT_STATUS, SHOP_STATUS, SHOP_AREA, SHOP_ADDRESS, REFUSE_REASON, AUDIT_USER, AUTH_TYPE, LINK_MAN, LINK_PHONE, LINK_TEL, LINK_WECHAT, GRPS, SHOWCASE_NUM, SHOWCASE_SURPLUS, SHOWCASE_USED, BANK_NAME, BANK_USER_NAME, CHILD_COUNT, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, AMOUNT, ENTRY, SHOP_TYPE, CUST_ID, GRPS_ADRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE, LEGAL_PERSON_ID_CARD, SHOP_IMGS ) values (#{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{catId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shipperScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showcaseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showcaseSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showcaseUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{entry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{grpsAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopImgs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update dcdg_goods_shop_base set CAT_ID = #{catId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAT_PATH = #{catPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_TITLE = #{shopTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_LOGO = #{shopLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NOTICE = #{shopNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_DESC = #{shopDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_SCORE = #{goodsScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERVICE_SCORE = #{serviceScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHIPPER_SCORE = #{shipperScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SHOP_STATUS = #{shopStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SHOP_AREA = #{shopArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_ADDRESS = #{shopAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFUSE_REASON = #{refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_USER = #{auditUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_TYPE = #{authType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, LINK_MAN = #{linkMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_PHONE = #{linkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_TEL = #{linkTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_WECHAT = #{linkWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRPS = #{grps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWCASE_NUM = #{showcaseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOWCASE_SURPLUS = #{showcaseSurplus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOWCASE_USED = #{showcaseUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_USER_NAME = #{bankUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_COUNT = #{childCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ENTRY = #{entry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_TYPE = #{shopType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, GRPS_ADRESS = #{grpsAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_PERSON_ID_CARD = #{legalPersonIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_IMGS = #{shopImgs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select SHOP_ID, CAT_ID, CAT_PATH, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_TITLE, SHOP_LOGO, SHOP_NOTICE, SHOP_DESC, GOODS_SCORE, SERVICE_SCORE, SHIPPER_SCORE, AUDIT_STATUS, SHOP_STATUS, SHOP_AREA, SHOP_ADDRESS, REFUSE_REASON, AUDIT_USER, AUTH_TYPE, LINK_MAN, LINK_PHONE, LINK_TEL, LINK_WECHAT, GRPS, SHOWCASE_NUM, SHOWCASE_SURPLUS, SHOWCASE_USED, BANK_NAME, BANK_USER_NAME, CHILD_COUNT, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, AMOUNT, ENTRY, SHOP_TYPE, CUST_ID, GRPS_ADRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE, LEGAL_PERSON_ID_CARD, SHOP_IMGS from dcdg_goods_shop_base where SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}
